sub_title: The best warrior is not the one who always triumphs, but the one who returns to fight without fear...
summary:
"Management" - "Marketing" - "Sales” - “Sports Marketing" - "Sponsoring/Partnership" - "Boat & Event Manager" -  "PR" - "Project Event Management" with a self driven personality, an experienced Senior Executive Business Manager since more than 38 years. 

Chasing results, creative and has an excellent communication, presentation & build experience over the years in negotiating. Keeps to the point, adjust communication style to suit audience. 

Very strong on strategy & has a deep understanding of business and technology specially within retail along with a keen intuition for cultural diversity. 

Reliable, trusty & credible are TOP issues. 

Marketeer with proven record………….. A week has 7 days & a day has 24 hours. A real TEAM PLAYER, natural entrepreneur, strategic thinker & PEOPLE MANAGER. 

Takes full responsibility for the performance of own team; leads, guides and motivates teams towards a common goal. 

Can guide & direct a group, establish and maintain the team spirit needed to achieve the group’s objective. Creates a climate in which people want to do their best; pushes tasks and decisions down; empowers; invites input from each person and shares visibility. 

Due to the previous jobs abroad over the last years, the willing & possibility to travel is there also the fact working with a lot of different cultures makes myself very comfortable in working in a international environment.

Specialties: Engaged in the business of offering "Management / Marketing - Sports Marketing / Sales" and has considerable skills, knowledge and experience in that field on a “non exclusive” basis in line with the Global & European Directives.

organizations.name: Gerson Lehrman Group Inc, Consultancy Group

projects.title: Team CJ Legend
projects.description:
As "Charles Jourdan" (CJ) in 6th place of 16 boats in the “Whitbread Round The World” edition 1989/90 with French skipper ALAIN GABBAY, later as Nicorette with Finnish skipper LUDDE INGVAL, she was the first yacht in the world to sail twenty-four hours of over 400 nm. The average speed at that time was 17 knots. 

In 1993/94 the Maxi-yacht was rebuilt (hull, deck layout, mast, boom, keel) to make her even faster. 

She went onto win more races/regattas such as 3 x  “Gotland Runt” 1994 & 2005 & 2007 as 3 consecutive wins in “Gothenburg Offshore Race” 2004 & 2005 & 2006, including taking 1st place twice in the legendary “Fastnet Race” in ’95 & ’97, especially in 1995 with a lead of over 24 hours over the next Maxi-yacht & 7th place in the Sydney Hobart Race in ‘97. 

Arriving back in Stockholm, CJ raised the full interest of the Swedish King Gustav V, who preferred CJ amongst all maxi boats anchored in front of the King’s palace. The King came on board & joined the crew the whole day for the inshore race (Harbors Fjord).

CJ Legend is kept in superb working order & have an extra big refit again in ’23 (keel & rudder out, x-ray of rigg. New navigation computer, rafts & safety equipment, paint of the hull – keel – rudder – deck, latest B&G instruments, MASTERVOLT electricity, Inmarsat Satcom, Spectra water maker, new Volvo Penta generator) and is ready to continue her work as a fast, fun and historic charter yacht. 

As a very well-known racing yacht with a very rich history and with her impressive length of almost 22 meters, a width of more than 5 meters and a total sail area of about 280 square meters, the yacht offers everything that makes the ambitious and demanding sailor’s heartbeat fast.

contributors.headline: The best warrior is not the one who always triumphs, but the one who returns to fight without fear...

profile_positions.description:
Marketing, Sports Marketing, Charter & Event organization for "Ocean Racing" on a 72ft ex "Whitbread round the World Race" Yacht in Europe & Caribbean area..... As Charles Jourdan (CJ) in 6th place of 16 boats in the “Whitbread round the World” edition 1989/90 with French skipper ALAIN GABBAY, later as Nicorette with Finnish skipper LUDDE INGVAL, she was the first yacht in the world to sail twenty-four hours of over 400 nm. The average speed at that time was 17 knots. 

In 1993/94 the Maxi-yacht was rebuilt (hull, deck layout, mast, boom, keel) to make her even faster. 

She went onto win more races/regattas such as 3 x  “Gotland Runt” 1994 & 2005 & 2007 as 3 consecutive wins in “Gothenburg Offshore Race” 2004 & 2005 & 2006, including taking 1st place twice in the legendary “Fastnet Race” in ’95 & ’97, especially in 1995 with a lead of over 24 hours over the next Maxi-yacht & 7th place in the Sydney Hobart Race in ‘97. 

Arriving back in Stockholm, CJ raised the full interest of the Swedish King Gustav V, who preferred CJ amongst all maxi boats anchored in front of the King’s palace. The King came on board & joined the crew the whole day for the inshore race (Harbors Fjord).

CJ Legend is kept in superb working order & have an extra big refit again in ’23 and is ready to continue her work as a fast, fun and historic charter yacht. 

As a very well-known racing yacht with a very rich history and with her impressive length of almost 22 meters, a width of more than 5 meters and a total sail area of about 280 square meters, the yacht offers everything that makes the ambitious and demanding sailor’s heartbeat fast.

Responsable & experienced in the set-up/ the marketing/ the management of international PRO & PRO-AM Sailing Teams & Ocean Racing in Europe and World Wide.
profile_positions.title: Managing Director & Team Principal

profile_positions.description:
GLG (Gerson Lehrman Group) is transforming the way the world’s top professionals share expertise and learn. 

GLG curates custom learning experiences among professionals and thought leaders across fields, within a rigorous compliance framework. 

GLG promotes knowledge exchange through conversations, small group convenings, mentorships, surveys, and other interactions with its network of more than 650,000 experts. 

Global, technology-driven, and nimble, GLG is the world’s largest membership for professional learning and expertise. Its 850 employees work in 21 offices in 12 countries.
profile_positions.title: Consultant (expert) in GLG Network

company.name: Ocean Breeze bv & Zuidzande Holding bv

profile_positions.company: Ocean Breeze bv & Zuidzande Holding bv
profile_positions.description:
Ocean Breeze is a former Volvo Ocean Racer that came in 3rd in the 2008-2009 VOR.
At that time called "Telefonica Blue”, the boat sailed under the Spanish flag with Dutch Skipper Bouwe Bekking.

After reaching 3rd place in that turbulent Volvo Ocean Race the boat was sold to an Irish/Chinese Team. "Sanya Lan" became 6th in the 2011-2012 VOR Race with Skipper Mike Sanderson.

The "Ocean Breeze” is now widely used. For example, you can sail for a day as a unique experience for your relationships, staff or guests.

The boat has undergone a total refit in 2011 & 2018.
profile_positions.title: CEO

profile_positions.description:
Previously, Marc was for years, an independent consultant for "Shore To Shore Europe ltd", a labeling & packaging services provider & "Universal Surveillance Systems llc", an US based Surveillance/ Source Tagging provider. 

He's knowledgeable about retailers such as Carrefour, C&A, Delhaize, El Corte Ingles, H&M, Lindex, Mango, Zara, Makro/Metro, Kaufhof & many others. 

He was responsible for inventory management, labeling management, financial planning, portfolio management, space management, security management, & process development. 

Actually Marc offers consultancy services as MANAGEMENT, SALES, MARKETING & SPORTS MARKETING in general to small, medium and large companies 

Also in relation to labels & labeling, printing, source tagging, retail security & loss prevention in the fashion, shoes, labels & labeling, packaging & EAS and RFID area. 

In 2013, he was involved as "Marketing Consultant" to launch a 100% natural, revitalized soft drink in Belgium.
profile_positions.title: Chief Operating Officer

company.name: MANHATTAN INVESTMENTS AG - BRANDIA SPORTS AG (CH)

profile_positions.company: MANHATTAN INVESTMENTS AG - BRANDIA SPORTS AG (CH)
profile_positions.description:
Marc was an independent consultant/director for "Manhattan Investments AG" & "Brandia Sports AG", a Branding – Advertising - Events – Sports Marketing company in Zurich (CH) -Amsterdam (NL) & Lisbon (P). 

Manhattan Investments AG  believes in the power of Brutal Simplicity...

The idea that simple ideas enter the brain quicker and stay there longer.

However it takes skills, some very specialist knowledge in this World of Sports, marketing, strategy and activities.

Our winning campaigns, for some of the world biggest Football Associations and Clubs have proved, time after time, that this Brutal Simplicity approach not only supplies market leading ideas but also generates real tangible results.

Brandia Sports helps their clients to generate more effective branding, loyalty, Sports marketing, and merchandising solutions.

Left in December'14 with immediate effect as Manhattan Investments AG and his Top Management are not keeping themselves to the contract by NOT paying the contractual fees since several months and the first signs of Fraud showed up.
profile_positions.title: Director

profile_positions.description:
Previously, Marc was in 2013 involved as independent "Marketing Consultant" to launch a 100% natural, revitalized soft drink in Belgium. 

The company’s new creation is free from taurine and caffeine and provides a range of vitamins and minerals. 

MI.AMI is the world’s first brand to adapt the Chinese Jiaogulan plant for use in the energy drink market and the company released a sport drink containing Jiaogulan.

Based in Belgium, MI.AMI’s new creation is rich in antioxidants and features a lemon and pineapple flavour. According to the brand’s website, the new drink ‘keeps you looking young and fresh’ and offers canned ‘exclusive luxury’.

MI.AMI Corp is a new age nutraceutical Company in Belgium and committed to the positive effects of a lifestyle, supported through wellness, active and healthy living.

MI.AMI Corp wants to develop long term customers relationships worldwide by providing products that restore a sense of wellbeing in addressing common aliments through retail.

100% NATURAL SOFT DRINK - NO taurine – NO caféine - 4 times more minerals and vitamins than Ginseng What about an exciting, revitalizing and glamorous soft drink to SPARKLE UP your life?

What about some zesty lemon and fresh pineapple sprinkled over your sunny day or your night out?

What about a soft drink that is deliciously filled to the rim with antioxidants, trace minerals and vitamins? 

The first drink ever to have processed the extraordinary, revitalizing capacities of Jiaogulan leaves, that keeps you looking young and fresh.

profile_positions.title: Chief Marketing Officer (CMO)

profile_positions.location: Greater New York City Area & Europe
profile_positions.description:
Kristiansand, actually an upscale niche men’s fragrance line, based in New York City and targeted to a metro-sexual audience. The goal is to distribute the product, and in a second step an entire product line, to upscale specialty and department stores throughout the United States & Europe. The distribution was strategically limited at launch, to coincide with the niche positioning of the brand. Cross-promotional opportunities will be utilized as part of the marketing strategy, to create the intrigue and demand for this fragrance.
The concept captures the essence of the Norwegian resort city, “Kristiansand”, in terms of scent, package and advertising. Kristiansand has been referred to as the “Norwegian Riviera”, an appeal that will be stressed to consumers. The goal is to tailor the fragrance to be an international success in both Europe & US. 

Kristiansand is a Scandinavian-American hybrid that will gain attention quickly due to its originality and sex appeal. As the brand begins to take off, the distribution will increase accordingly.

Kristiansand New York offers today a 50ml & 100ml men’s fragrance. Both co-founders "Britt Ross & Elisabeth Steen" are very proud of their country and have strong ties to it. To pay homage their country they hold close to their heart, they decided to name their product line Kristiansand, after their home town.

Since the HQ of the brand is based in New York, the city's name is always set under the Kristiansand word mark. The heart of the Kristiansand scent captures a bold Norwegian aroma with a subtle uniqueness that keeps you wanting more. 

The inspiration comes from the incomparable uniqueness of New York, which has enhanced both Britt & Elisabeth's lives since their move to the city and is reflected in the fragrance. 

Drom Fragrances’ perfumer Pierre Constantin-Gueros created Kristiansand New York with careful detail in Drom’s Tribeca NYC studio.
profile_positions.title: CEO/Co-Owner/Chairman Board of Directors

profile_positions.description:
Rancho Cucamonga, CA, February 1, 2010 – To further its global expansion plans, USS Corporation announces Marc Leclercq has joined USS as Vice President to lead the EMEA Headquarters office in Belgium and head expansion efforts abroad.

Set up whole EMEA organisation from scratch to warehousing, over financial representatives to sales structure. Hold full P&L responsibility for total Europe, Middle East & Africa  operations through direct training, leadership and supervision of the National Sales Managers, a network of 7 independents across EMEA territories.
profile_positions.title: Vice President EMEA

profile_positions.description:
Marc was engaged in the business of offering Consultancy Services in relation to "Source Tagging" - "Loss Prevention" in the Fashion, Shoes, Labels & Labelling, Packaging, EAS area and has considerable skills, knowledge and experience in that field on a “non exclusive” basis in line with the European Directive.

A full EAS Service Provider which provides users an unbiased & consultative approach to Loss Prevention & “Secured at Source” solutions. 

Marc provides retail “Secured at Source” solutions using RF and AM EAS technology. Due to years of experience in Global Source Tagging Programs, "PROFIT PROTECTION SERVICES" supports users to maximise the benefits from the EAS hardware installation.
profile_positions.title: Independant Consultant Global EAS Source Tagging
